3. Control Version Systems Drivers¶

3.1. Git¶

Driver for managing git repositories

fuel_ci.drivers.cvs.git.repo_clone(repo)[source]¶

Clone repo or checkout last changes on branch :param repo: (Repository) object with “url”, “path” and “branch” attributes
